title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S. 3021 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
October 23, 2018
On Tuesday, October 23, 2018, the President signed into law:S. 3021, the “America’s Water Infrastructure Act of 2018,” which authorizes construction of Army Corps of Engineers water resources projects for flood risk management, navigation, hurricane and storm damage risk reduction, and environmental restoration; modifies previously authorized projects; and  contains other water-related provisions.
